mapper.sql: id, session_id, kb_ids, user_id, question, answer, tokens_used, process_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.knowledge_base_id, kb.name as knowledge_base_name, h.user_id, u.nickname as user_name, h.question, h.answer, h.create_time, h.update_time FROM kb_chat_history h LEFT JOIN kb_knowledge_base kb ON h.knowledge_base_id = kb.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON h.user_id = u.id WHERE h.deleted = 0 AND h.knowledge_base_id = #{knowledgeBaseId} AND h.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY h.create_time DESC

SELECT h.id, h.knowledge_base_id, kb.name as knowledge_base_name, h.user_id, u.nickname as user_name, h.question, h.answer, h.create_time, h.update_time FROM kb_chat_history h LEFT JOIN kb_knowledge_base kb ON h.knowledge_base_id = kb.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON h.user_id = u.id WHERE h.id = #{id} AND h.deleted = 0

SELECT ID, kb_ids, question, answer, session_id, create_time FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON ( session_id ) ID, kb_ids, question, answer, session_id, create_time FROM kb_chat_history WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY session_id, create_time DESC ) T ORDER BY create_time DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE kb_chat_history SET deleted = 1 WHERE knowledge_base_id = #{knowledgeBaseId} AND deleted = 0
